txt.en: Seek out Whelan Appledore and tell him of your accomplishments.

'Well there [placeholder], it seems that you have little need for introduction in these areas of Arnor - few indeed are there who have not at least heard your name, I think, for many deeds have you performed on behalf of the people of Bree and the surrounding lands\n\nMany folk here rarely leave their towns and farms, and know little of the mysteries that lay close at hand - but not so one such as you! If the rumours do you any justice, it would seem that you have righted a great many wrongs, and unravelled many of the mysteries that surround these lands. I have a long, quiet evening ahead of me, and certainly no more useful way to idle away that time than to hear of these adventures from the one responsible, if you would join me for a pint or two...'

Danger presses upon Bree-land from all sides, foreshadowing the ascension of a great darkness. You are called to stand against the Shadow. Your extraordinary efforts on behalf of Bree-land will be rewarded.
Seek out Whelan Appledore and tell him of your accomplishments.
Complete a large number of quests in Bree-land.
Your extraordinary efforts on behalf of Bree-land will be rewarded.
